channel.title: CVE Feed for Integrated Control Technology -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Integrated Control Technology -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-29941|2024-05-06T22:44:35.066Z -- Integrated Control Technology -- TSEC
item.description: Insecure storage of the ICT MIFARE and DESFire encryption keys in the firmware binary allows malicious actors to create credentials for any site code and card number that is using the default ICT encryption.
